articles.title: Canada names women's cricket team for ICC World Cup Americas Qualifier
articles.description: TORONTO — Kamna Mirchandan will captain Canada at the ICC 2022 Women’s T20 World Cup Americas Qualifier later this month in Mexico. The tournament, which also features Argentina, Brazil and the U.S., will take place Oct.

articles.title: Martinez key as Villa edge Spurs for star who stole Alexis Sanchez moniker
articles.description: Aston Villa are reported to be fast emerging as favourites to land one of Argentina's brightest young talents in Julian Alvarez - thanks, in no small part, to Villans goalkeeper Emi Martinez.
articles.content:
Aston Villa are reportedly fast emerging as favourites to land one of Argentina’s brightest young talents – thanks, in no small part, to Villans goalkeeper Emi Martinez.

articles.title: Cut Supply to Lionel Messi, Paraguay Players Told Ahead of FIFA World Cup Qualifiers
articles.description: Paraguay will focus on cutting supply to Argentina captain Lionel Messi when the teams meet in a 2022 FIFA World Cup qualifier, head coach Eduardo Berizzo has said.
articles.content: Paraguay will focus on cutting supply to Argentina captain Lionel Messi when the teams meet in a 2022 FIFA World Cup qualifier, head coach Eduardo Berizzo has said. Berizzo told reporters on Wednesday (IST) that his players had been briefed on how to... [1080 chars]

articles.title: Brazil, Argentina face tests as World Cup qualifying resumes
articles.description: Brazil and Argentina will be hoping to avoid any more interruptions when World Cup qualifying resumes Thursday across South America.
articles.content:
Brazil and Argentina will be hoping to avoid any more interruptions when World Cup qualifying resumes Thursday across South America.

articles.title: Brazil, Argentina Face Tests As WCup Qualifying Resumes
articles.description: SAO PAULO: Brazil and Argentina will be hoping to actually finish their games this time when World Cup qualifying resumes Thursday across South America.

articles.title: Argentine farmers close deals for 31 mln tonnes of 2020/21 soy - ministry
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Oct 5 (Reuters) - Farmers in Argentina have sold 31 million tonnes of soybeans from the 2020/21 season after transactions for 464,200 tonnes were recorded over the last week, the Agriculture Ministry said on Tuesday in a report with data updated through Sept.
